original_title: Nicole Collier: Democratic Texas lawmaker passes 24-hour mark on state House floor after refusing GOP demand for law enforcement escort | CNN Politics
article_summary: Texas Democrat Rep. Nicole Collier has been on the state House floor for over 24 hours in protest, refusing to be placed under the watch of the Department of Public Safety after House Speaker Dustin Burrows imposed constraints on their movements. This comes as Democrats returned to the Capitol in Austin to prevent a vote on a controversial Republican redistricting plan.</s>
